6.63: Reduced  Stifling Dagger cooldown from 10 to 8.
6.60: Replaced  Blink Strike with  Phantom Strike
6.43: Increased  Blink Strike cast range from 700 on each level to 700/800/900/1000.
6.81b: Increased  Phantom Strike attack speed bonus from 100 to 130.
6.69: Rescaled Base  strength and gain from 17 + 2.05 to 20 + 1.85. Reduced  Phantom Strike cooldown from 30/20/10/5 to 20/15/10/5.
6.04: Blink Strike Now blinks closer to the target. Removed the 0.3 second delay on the damage.  Coup de Grace Increased proc chance from 5%/10%/15% to 15% on each level. Reduced critical damage from 400% on each level to 200%/300%/400%.
6.06: Fixed  Blink Strike dealing no damage.
6.07: Fixed some memory leak issues with  Blink Strike.
6.53: Stifling Dagger Increased cast range from 800 to 1200. Increased movement speed slow from 20%/25%/30%/35% to 50% on each level. Reduced slow duration from 2/2.75/3.5/4.25 to 1/2/3/4. Reduced manacost from 35/30/30/25 to 30/25/20/15.
6.00: Reduced base armor from 0 to -1 (total armor is now 2.22).  Blink Strike Now makes the caster face the target after blinking. Fixed not going into cooldown when used. Added a 0.3 second delay to the damage, so it doesn't happen instantly upon blinking.
6.35: Increased base armor from -1 to 1 (total armor is now 4.22).
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.55: Increased  Blur dodge chance from 7%/14%/21%/28% to 15%/20%/25%/30%.
6.54: Blur visual effect (the transparency) is now applied only to enemies.
6.79: Stifling Dagger No longer ignores its cast backswing. Is now disjointable. Rescaled creep damage from 50/100/150/200 to 60/100/140/180. Rescaled hero damage from 25/50/75/100 to 30/50/70/90.  Coup de Grace now also grants Stifling Dagger the same critical proc chance with the same damage multipliers.
6.78: Increased  Blur dodge chance from 20%/25%/30%/35% to 20%/25%/30%/40%.
6.51: Replaced Shadow Strike with  Stifling Dagger
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Increased  Coup de Grace critical damage from 250%/325%/400% to 250%/350%/450%.
6.74: Phantom Strike Icreased cast range from 700/800/900/1000 to 1000. Reduced cooldown from 20/15/10/5 to 14/11/8/5.
6.10: Blink Strike Can now be cast on allied units. Slightly improved timing.
6.71: Blur Now causes Phantom Assassin to only get transparent when an enemy hero is within 1600 range of her. This effect has a 1.5 second delay. Now also causes Phantom Assassin to disappear on the minimap when an enemy hero iswithin 1600 range of her. This effect has also a 1.5 second delay. The 20%/25%/30%/35% evasion is still permanent. Increased  Coup de Grace critical damage from 200%/300%/400% to 250%/325%/400%.
6.70: Increased  Blur dodge chance from 15%/20%/25%/30% to 20%/25%/30%/35%.
6.73: Stifling Dagger Increased creep damage from 40/80/120/160 to 50/100/150/200. Increased hero damage from 20/40/60/80 to 25/50/75/100.
6.80: Blur Now also reacts on invisible heroes. Reduced enemy detection delay from 1.5 to 0.75.
6.81: Reduced  Stifling Dagger cooldown from 8 to 6. Increased  Blur dodge chance from 20%/25%/30%/40% to 20%/30%/40%/50%.
6.82: Blur minimap hide now has the opposite effect, and is active when no enemies are within a 1600.
6.83: Reduced  Coup de Grace critical damage from 250%/350%/450% to 230%/340%/450%
